values:
Okay, so here's this. I've never been to a convention before even though I have really wanted to! A lot of stuff would just get in the way. Like unable to pay for gas to get to the con, or not enough money for anything period, or well.. ALOT of stuff. While browsing around, I noticed this Ad for AnimeWorld Chicago, saying that Vic Mignogna would be there! I did all the research on the cost of just going there on the day Vic would be there and yeah the prices were cheaper. I was SO excited!
By the way, AnimeWorld Chicago is a brand new anime convention in Chicago!
I pre-registered, then recently after that, I got my friend Tiffany into anime/manga. : D So she  decided to go with me!
We bought her pre-register thing too.
But then we were worried we wouldn't get his autograph since he is really popular and all..
There was this 'VIP Autograph Package' thing. It was 35 bucks each but it made it so you would be first in line for autographs. Only 35 of those. Contemplated for daaaays. But we decided to get one for each of us! Yay!
So tick tock the day for the con finally arrives. We woke up at 3:45AM to leave by 4AM to make it to Chicago by at least 8AM. [Traffic is nil at that hour too. Lol.]
We finally get there, me in my L Death Note shirt & Tiff in my Kyo Fruits Basket hat. :D We got our badges [only with a little trouble. not finding ours for some reason. this is why you always carry the receipts people~!] and our VIP stuff. Which was a shirt that says 'I was signed at AnimeWorldChicago', a Sharpie that says AnimeWorld on it, a nice photo of Vic, and tickets with our number in line for the autograph sessions. 
What was my number? Number. 2. I KID YOU NOT! But more on that later. xD;
We walked around for a little, went to the video room after walking. Watched a few episodes of anime then went to the dealers room and bought some yaoi~ [DUN JUDGE MEEEEEEE. xD]
Then left to get in line for Vic's Q&A panel. We got in and managed to get in the 2nd row from the front. :DD A Mortal Kombat thing happened first. THEN IT WAS VIC TIMEEE.
We all decided to sing him Happy Birthday when he came out since it was his birthday next week. XD! But first he threw us some Gummy Fish he got from Sweden THEN we sang him the song. He was surprised to say the least. "Let's not mention any numbers, let's just say I'm..thirtysometfsjdsgnj." LOL. Oh I got plenty of video of the panel! May post links later when I finally get it uploaded to youtube. May take a while~
SO autograph time. Turned out that..the stage was where he was autographing. I was 2nd to get autographs. >////>; &nd he took two at a time. So I was up there. In front of the hundreds of fans waiting for an autograph LOL OH MY. So I bought a CD that has some songs he sang all remixed and awesome. Then waited for the 1st girl to get done. Once in front of him, I kinda went blank for a second. Asked him to sign my shirt, CD & Ouran High School Host Club case over Tamaki's part on it. xD When I had asked him if he would sign that Ouran Case, he just seemed so happy rofl. "Of course!" He was more than happy to sign all those. Then I asked if I could get a picture with him. Teehee. He said something along the lines of "Heck yeah!". And I officially got one, people..a VIC MIGNOGNA HUG. The first picture turned out blurry so he insisted on re-taking it. So another hug for meeee. [Also, when seeing the blurry photo, he took my phone & navigated back the camera screen. Vic used my phone..<3333!]  After that, Tiffany was behind me, telling him that I was his #1 fan. Haha! I told him I really enjoy his voice work & acting and he thanked me and gave me ANOTHER hug!
I was so shocked that I actually got to get so clsoe to him. Stfu, I'm a fangirl I know. xD His hugs were so warm! And, shut up shut up, he smelled GOOD. Tiffany can back me up on that. His cologne was a-maz-ing!
I was surprised that he was so nice! I heard that he was such a sweet man but you never really know until you meet him! He appreciates his fans so much and I love that about him. <3 
So after that awesome experience, we wandered around the Dealer's Room and I bought some more stuff. I am now broke LOL. 
Overall, the experience of just being there for the last day was FANTASTIC! The staff was super nice and helpful, the panels were organized and everything was just great!
Me & Tiffany are DEF. going back next year for the WHOLE weekend this time! :3
And I leave you with the pic of me & Vic. And the stuff I had signed plus just that pic of Vic in with that stuff. ~
http://whitcake.livejournal.com/9868.html

1999 - April 11th, 2011.
[1999 being the time they saved him from the streets.]
This was a rough one on me.. And Grandma/Grandpa as well as Mom. Woke up to a call from mom saying that they did a surgery on max and found tumors wrapped around his spinal cord and he had a week at most. They decided to put him down today though, because he was suffering.. Grandpa, Gramma and me took him on one last walk, which he would hardly walk. We stopped and put his blanket down and after a while, he sat. After we cried and kissed him a lot, we took him back inside the vet's office. Mom stopped by and Gramma/Grandpa left. They couldn't be here for him being put to sleep..it would have killed them. Me and mom held him and pet him while he was being put to sleep. It was so hard, I could hardly take it. But he passed on silently, a few breaths later, and then we put his favorite blanket on him and the vet's wrapped him in his blanket and put him in a cardboard casket.
Me, mom and Matt dug a hole and put him in..and put a few flowers on top. We buried him under his favorite tree in Gramma's backyard.

I will upload the pics of where he is buried soon.

Max, you were a great dog. I loved dogsitting you, especially when you hopped up on the bed right next to me and slept. You had a long life and you will be severely missed. VERY much.
Now, you are in no more pain. Now, you are at peace. We love you, Max.

The song Into The West, popped into my head, thinking about him. The part where she says, 'Safe in my arms, you're only sleeping' just reminds me of when we were there with him, holding him as he took his last breaths of this world.. Oh Max. We really love you.

Why do you weep? What are these tears upon your face? Soon you will see, All of your fears will pass away. Safe in my arms, You're only sleeping. What can you see.. on the horizon? Why do the white gulls call? Across the sea, a pale moon rises. The ships have come to carry you home.

http://www.azlyrics.com/lyrics/annielennox/intothewest.html




[Caitlyn made this pic..thanks so much!]

We got her on Christmas when I was 9 years old and my bro Logan was 7. Her name was Belle and she was a Boxer. She was the runt puppy of the litter and she was a sweetie. When we moved out of the country and into town, we left her out in the country with my grandparents. Belle liked roaming around so in town woulda been bad for her. Haha I remember she would eat the strangest things. Dead birds, poop, anything. Literally. She was happy and grandpa loved her. First dog he got attached to. She lived a long life and died of old age.
You will live on in my heart.
Belle~ 1997-2010


~Whit

August 15th, 2010
Part of their 'Carnival of Madness' Tour!

Me & Raya went to the State Fair, walked around allll day in that sweltering heat.. but it was worth it in the end when we got to see Shinedown and Chevelle!
Chevelle was good, but the main awesomeness was Shinedown! Their opening was cool! They were all behind a curtain and you could see their shadows while circus music played, then the white curtain was ripped down and they started playing! They all rocked that place! They even played '45'! I literally squealed when they started playing it. <3 The whole concert I screamed so much and sang so much that I doubt I will have a voice tomorrow. xD Shinedown even got a call from Sylvester Stallone one day. He wanted them to make a song for The Expendables! :D He said that he had daughters and if they didn't like it, then he would put Shinedown in his next movie and kill them all, haha! I was planning on seeing that, now I really will! The whole band really played to the fans and showed appreciation. Man, that place was packed. The Lead singer even came up into the bleachers! O.O To make sure we were rockin' just as hard as the most pit was. 8D We were! Even Raya was rockin' hard! Lead singer talked about his grandmother & that she had a love affair with the stars in the sky. Because she said that people never really are gone, they go into the stars. Then played a song and we all put up lighters or cell phones and it was SO pretty!
They also played their song 'Her Name Is Alice' made for the new Alice in Wonderland movie. Coooooooooool.  Haha they left the stage and everyone kept cheering even as the lights went off on the stage. They hadn't even played Second Chance yet. We all kept cheering for around 5 minutes and then they came back, and he said how awesome our city was and played 2 more songs! 'Second Chance' & then 'Simple Man'! Aha, but Brent, lead singer, he had this grin on his face when talking to the crowd. "I'm not gonna get up on this stage and pretend to be all badass, you know why? Because you couldn't pry this smile off my face with a crowbar". :D
ROFL and when he mentioned how God must have had a sense of humor, because "admit it guys, when we stand naked in front of a mirror, we look kinda funny", but wet on to say how women were such beautiful, perfect creatures. And to forgive guys for messing up sometimes and that they love us. xD And that the next song was for us ladies and on behalf of the men. The song was 'If You Only Knew'. <3

But, before the concert, I bought a bandanna and a CD. The first 200 people to buy the CD got to meet them and have autographs after the show. So, I met them. They. Were. SO. NICE! And even more awesome in person! They wanted to shake everyone's hand before even signing anything. I told them this was my first Shinedown concert and the drummer gave me a high five. Eric, the bass and backup vocals guy, was reading my T-shirt and then laughed and said it was a cool shirt. It was my 'We Dig Chicks at Farm and Home Supply' shirt. xD BUT GOD DAMNIT. I was acting so shy and girly and nervous! All kinda giggly and stuff. x////x Especially when I met the singer! OI! Man! X///X I asked him if he could please autograph the cd to me nd he did. He was so casual, like he was talking to his buddy. I thanked him 'so much!' and he said 'No problem sweetie, thanks for coming to see us.'
omg.
and i got Raya a signed State Fair Schedule. :D I ran outta there saying 'I got this for you!' And she was so happy she kinda screamed. I had them put 'To: Raya' on it.
I LOVE YOU SHINEDOWN! Keep on rockin'!

~Whit

And some girl told him that she 'jacked off' horses to sell the sperm. HAHAAA! Through the whole night, he played off that. "Huh, horse sperm. LIQUID GOLD!" Omg hahaaa.
He also played off this chick that was getting married & her fiance was working extra at Steak N' Shake to pay for their honeymoon to Indianapolis HA.
He was hilarious.

Mmhm.
I'm about to watch the 2 hour special of Deadliest Catch.. and I probably will cry through the whole flipping thing. :'(
He was my favorite captain on the show.. and his death hit me like a ton of bricks. Like Heath Ledger's death. It's one of those things that well.. you like someone so much that you think they'll live forever. You want them to live forever. Despite they're lifestyle that they live, the smoking and stuff..
Rest is peace, Captain Phil Harris. Sail on those calm seas. My prayers go out to his family and friends.
We all will miss you. Deadliest Catch won't be the same without you.

~Whit

Trying to get over Nikki isn't easy.
"I'm sorry.. but I think you'll be better with out me.. I can't do it, I regret what I've lost with you. Heck I'm crying about it, I hardly ever cry. I know I act like I'm over this... but am not, it kills me... it's best if I leave you, so you can be ultra happy when your friend gets there. I'm sorry for being an ass."
(Just sent me that comment)
Ya'know, I SORT OF believe her.
If it wasn't for the pure fact that only a day after we broke up, a "FRIEND" was trying to get with her already.
Hahahahaha lovely.
And now I find out who this "FRIEND" is. And I find myself both ROFL'ing and crying my eyes out.
It's was one of those "FRIENDS" she would be flirty with.
She says she doesn't want me out of her life, because she still loves me n shit, before that comment up there.
After responding to that comment with reasons why I want to be with her and pouring my heart out, I get this.
"I don't know...
I mean.. I don't think I'm good for you, I failed at handling your mood swings... I just got mad v_v
I wasn't supportive in anyways at all.
I can give you so much more as a friend.
it's just gonna take some time to get over the hurt..
some time apart maybe.."
lollcopter.
I sent her something that expressed my hurt. And told her to do whatever she wanted. That the love no longer existed.
Then the "FRIEND" steps in and says this.
"You still love her and she still loves you you both could go back together who knows? somehow i feel like i am in the middle of both of you...and i want her to be happy and well confortable."
LULZ.
You FEEL LIKE you're in the middle of this?! Where have you been? Fucking moron. & Nikki obviously doesn't love me anymore. And I don't want to hear from that homewrecker again. but probably will. :/
Gawd, it's nice to know that once again, I put my heart on the line, let my walls down from around it, just to have it crushed.
My heart is dead, pretty much. Go Nikki! You did your job well.

~Whit

But hey, shit happens.
I let my walls down, fall for her, have great times, make great memories..and then in an instant it's all over and she doesn't seem to care that much.
sigh~
And this is why I stayed single for 2 years. Tired of the hurt. The pain. The betrayal.

~Whit

Like..me wanting her to stop flirting with..anyone. >_> Because it upsets me. Harmless friend flirts, I dun care about. And then there's flirting that may seem harmless to others, but looks serious to me. .____.
So I gave in and told her about my worries. Like how i'm afraid the JERKFUCKTARD Tatsu will scoop her up as soon as me and her have problems. 
And she said what? That he's waiting for someone else and to leave him out of this.
LOLOLOLOLOL.
Funny.. back when he was calling me every cuss word under the sun, she didn't tell HIM to stop. Even I held my tongue before he just kept talking shit about me. Then when I talk shit to him, she tells ME to stop. wtf is that shit? Pisses me off just a littttttttle bit. :/
ANYWAY, she's mad at me. Tsk. Thus being why I don't talk to her about this stuff. I know that she would never do that stuff to me, but I still worry. She lives in Australia for God's sake! A looooooong ways away. I think worrying is normal. .3.
Eh, I hope we work this out. e-e

~Whit
